mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ITEM_ORDER_T ( ITEM_ORDER_NO, USER_NO, ORDER_DATE, NAME, MOBILE, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ORDER_TOTAL, PAY_METHOD
) VALUES ( #{itemOrderNo}, #{userNo}, NOW(), #{name}, #{mobile}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{orderTotal}, #{payMethod} );
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_ORDER_NO, USER_NO, ORDER_DATE, NAME, MOBILE, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS ,ORDER_TOTAL, PAY_METHOD FROM (SELECT ITEM_ORDER_NO, USER_NO, ORDER_DATE, NAME, MOBILE, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ORDER_TOTAL, PAY_METHOD FROM ITEM_ORDER_T WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY ITEM_ORDER_NO DESC LIMIT 1) AS A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL_T (USER_NO, ITEM_ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, QUANTITY, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_MAIN_IMG) SELECT USER_NO, #{itemOrderNo},ITEM_NO, QUANTITY, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_MAIN_IMG FROM CART_T
mapper.select: SELECT A.ITEM_ORDER_NO, A.USER_NO, A.ORDER_DATE, A.NAME, MOBILE, A.POSTCODE, A.ROAD_ADDRESS, A.DETAIL_ADDRESS, A.ORDER_TOTAL, A.PAY_METHOD, A.DELIVERY, B.ITEM_NO, B.QUANTITY, B.ITEM_TITLE, B.ITEM_PRICE, B.ITEM_MAIN_IMG FROM ITEM_ORDER_T A INNER JOIN ORDER_DETAIL_T B ON A.ITEM_ORDER_NO = B.ITEM_ORDER_NO WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.ITEM_ORDER_NO = #{itemOrderNo}
